vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.13;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
§ Adbeel = "chastened of God"
third son of Ishmael and grandson of Abraham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Abdeel = "milagro de Dios", "discaplinado de Dios" o "dedo de Dios"   hijo de Ismael
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞德別, 押德別 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神的懲罰"
以實瑪利的第三個兒子, 亞伯拉罕的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚德别, 押德别 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神的惩罚"
以实玛利的第三个儿子, 亚伯拉罕的孙子
